education.institution: SIES College of Arts, Science & Commerce

awards.title: Employee of the Month
awards.summary: Recognized for exceptional leadership and contributions to website development projects, resulting in improved user experience metrics and on-time project delivery.

awards.title: Best Innovation Award
awards.summary: Received for developing task formatting extension for Chrome, enhancing task management efficiency and workflow processes.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Developed E-Commerce platform using Next.js (MongoDB, Node.js), reducing load times by 30% and improving overall website performance by 25%. Implemented secure user authentication with Crypto.js and JWT tokens, decreasing security incidents by 40%. Integrated Paytm payment gateway, increasing successful and secure payment transactions by 25%. Designed Admin Login and Dashboard, enhancing administrative productivity by 30% and reducing time spent on product and category management tasks by 25%.

highlights: Led design, development, and maintenance of responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js on CMS platforms such as WordPress, improving user experience metrics by 20%.
Collaborated with clients and cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize website requirements, ensuring on-time project delivery with a 100% accuracy rate.
Utilized Git for version control, enabling efficient collaboration and achieving a 100% delivery rate.
Reduced bug count by 30% through unit testing and debugging, ensuring optimal website functionality.
Developed engaging marketing emails and impactful iPad presentations, enhancing email development efficiency by 40% and managing promotional materials to reduce turnaround time by 25%.
Created an ASCII Snippet extension for VS Studio, improving development processes by 50%.
Engineered a task formatting extension for Chrome, enhancing task management by 40% and workflow efficiency.
Conducted in-person client meetings, analyzed, troubleshot, and diagnosed hardware issues.
Reduced average issue resolution time by 20%, ensuring timely solutions.
Updated, maintained, and monitored computer networks, improving performance by 15% and reducing downtime by 25%.
Installed and configured computer systems and applications, contributing to a 20% setup time reduction.
Enhanced user interaction metrics by 25% and website responsiveness by 20% through implementing interactive features with JavaScript and modern libraries.
Designed web components across projects, increasing user satisfaction by 15% and usability metrics by 20%.
